overview.en: Lattice Token (LTX) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Lattice Token has a current supply of 100,000,000 with 28,653,895.88 in circulation. The last known price of Lattice Token is 0.99900434 USD and is down -14.27 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 7 active market(s) with $2,021,337.57 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://lattice.exchange/.
